original_title: Let's Kiss (Franco Grillini storia di una rivoluzione gentile)
overview: The film is about Franco Grillini, a somewhat late-blooming gay politician from Bologna, born in 1955 into a farming family, with a degree in education, who has always been active in the fight for the recognition of gay, lesbian, and transsexual civil rights.
title: Let's Kiss (History of a Gentle Revolution)
